snippet.title: Dawn's Light 3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the demo at http://www.johnwizard.com

Harvey wakes to find himself in a strange place. After a shocking twist, Harvey is told he must face the consequences of his actions, whatever that means.

Dawn's Light 3 features Harvey in his first solo adventure. A new automated battle system combined with more interactive areas and intricate dungeons makes this the most exciting Dawn's Light since Dawn's Light 2!

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
